questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Urban environment

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A clear day
B) A foggy day
C) A sunny day
D) A rainy day

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A building
C) A tree
D) A vehicle

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A tall building
D) A car

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bench
B) A street
C) A building
D) A car

What is the weather condition in the photo?
A) Clear
B) Foggy
C) Rainy
D) Snowy

How visible is the building in the photo?
A) Very clear
B) Slightly visible
C) Not visible at all
D) Completely clear

What is the visibility like in the photo?
A) Clear
B) Poor
C) Excellent
D) Very clear

What is the color tone of the photo?
A) Bright
B) Dark
C) Muted
D) Colorful

What is the main element in the photo?
A) Foggy weather
B) Architecture
C) People
D) Animals

What could be the reason for the fog in the photo?
A) Pollution
B) Weather conditions
C) Fire
D) Dust storm

What is the state of the sky in the photo?
A) Clear
B) Overcast
C) Foggy
D) Stormy

What is the primary color in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Grey
C) Green
D) Yellow

What is the level of detail visible in the photo?
A) High
B) Medium
C) Low
D) Very high

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) Aerial
B) Ground level
C) Eye level
D) Close-up

What is the photo's depth of field like?
A) Shallow
B) Deep
C) Medium
D) Very deep

How does the fog affect the photo?
A) Enhances visibility
B) Reduces visibility
C) Does not affect visibility
D) Makes it clearer

What is the building's texture in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Cannot be determined
D) Glossy

What is the dominant element in the photo?
A) Water
B) Sky
C) Building
D) Trees

How does the fog affect the colors in the photo?
A) Makes them vibrant
B) Mutes them
C) Does not affect them
D) Enhances them

How does the fog affect the overall clarity of the photo?
A) Increases clarity
B) Decreases clarity
C) Does not affect clarity
D) Enhances details

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) A building
D) A car
